ModMetaData.name: MusicJoy
ModMetaData.author: white_altar
ModMetaData.description:
-Victrola Phonograph A classic, Victorian, crank-powered turntable, stylus and amplifying horn. Music --> Recording, Needs to be researched. -IN PROGRESS Animal through Ultra tech level music research tree. Various Items for playing miusic for each era. Musical Intruments. Playlists. Jamming!
(Version: 0.16.4) Language: English
